EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Raises $50M Series D | Win a Phantom 2 Vision+ Drone | turboticker January 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar | Cloud Mechanics: Assuring Performance in Shared Environments January 28, 2015 | 12pm EST
<http://vmturbo.com/expedient-webinar/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickerjan&utm_content=012215> Drones on Drones VMTurbo 5.0 marked the biggest release since the founding of VMTurbo in 2009. This latest version features five new Control Modules, extending VMTurbo-owners' control to Network, Hybrid Cloud, VDI, Applications, and Containers.
As a celebration of this release, we've raffled away a Phantom 2 Vision+ Drone every month since November from among those who take VMTurbo 5.0 for a 30-Day test drive <http://vmturbo.com/35000-decisions?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickerjan&utm_content=012215>. VMTurbo Raises $50M Series D Funding
126% Growth in Annual Revenue, 18th Consecutive Quarter of Record Revenue, 23% Q/Q Growth, Industry Recognition and New Product Innovation Drive Increasing Customer Adoption and Major Round of Funding Led by ICONIQ Capital for 2015... Read More <http://vmturbo.com/press-releases/momentum-accelerates-record-revenue-2014?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickerjan&utm_content=012215> | BostInno <http://bostinno.streetwise.co/2015/01/21/vmturbo-raises-50m/> Video: What Is Demand-Driven Control?
Watch this 3-minute video <http://youtu.be/LTO9pI66a-A> and learn the difference between old school IT operations management and the new age of demand-driven infrastructure control. Whitepaper: The Path to Hybrid Cloud A full 49% of enterprises are running some applications in Amazon Web Services®, according to a recent study by RightScale®. Read this whitepaper <http://vmturbo.com/hybrid-cloud-intelligent-bursting-aws-microsoft-azure?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tickerjan&utm_content=012215> to learn about the challenges and barriers to effective hybrid implementation: Which workloads should burst Where and When? www.vmturbo.com 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
contacts <http://go.vmturbo.com/contact-us.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | website <http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | privacy policy <http://www.vmturbo.com/privacy-policy?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ticker> | forward <{{system.forwardToFriendLink:default=edit%20me}}>
